name: @wo0zz1/url-shortener-shared
description: Shared utilities for NestJS url shortener

scripts.version:update:major: yarn build && git add . && yarn version --major && git push --tags && yarn publish --no-push
scripts.version:update:minor: yarn build && git add . && yarn version --minor && git push --tags && yarn publish --no-push
scripts.version:update:patch: yarn build && git add . && yarn version --patch && git push --tags && yarn publish --no-push

author: Wo0zZ1
